str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.
Dealing with other men, conduct, life, behavior, manner of life. From anastrepho; behavior.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The Jewish religion, Judaism. From Ioudaizo; 'Judaism', i.e. The Jewish faith and usages.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To lay waste, destroy, ravage, harass. Prolongation from pertho; to ravage.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
